description: Copperstone Resources AB engages in mining and exploration for base and precious metals. The company is headquartered in Danderyd, Stockholm and currently employs 9 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2007-02-22. The company holds over 30 exploration permits of a total area of approximately 20,000 hectares. The firm has exploration operations located in Sweden in Hakansboda, Tvistbo, Stalldalen, Garpen and Vetlanda, among others. The company has three wholly owned subsidiaries, namely Kopparberg Mining Exploration AB, which was engaged in the exploration activities, Argo AB, which carried out service commissions, both internally and externally, and Copperstone Skelleftea AB, the operational exploration company in the Copperstone area. The instances the Company explores, are found primarily in copper, zinc, gold and silver.
naicsNationalIndustry: Copper Ore and Nickel Ore Mining
name: Copperstone Resources AB (publ)
